ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:18:12 [Issue ID 4000-1175587] urn:comicvine:4000-1175587 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/1175587 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 16:32:13. [Issue ID 1175587]
ComicInfo.Summary:
DANIEL WAY's bloody Crossed story continues as the seaworthy survivors try to find their way among the infected. Horror comes in all shapes and sizes, and the crew of the Coast Guard ship is about to find that out in most heinous fashion. The Captain thought he knew the Crossed, knew the rules for dealing with and outlasting them. But in a world full of maniacs, the only rule you can count on is an unpredictable grueling and violent ending.
Available with Regular, Wraparound and Torture covers by Rafa Ortiz and special Red Crossed Incentive cover.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Rafa Ortiz | 1 | Torture | Torture Cover | Rafa Ortiz | 2 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Rafa Ortiz | 3 | RI | Retailer Incentive Red Crossed Cover | Rafa Ortiz | Missing | NOTE: All the covers for this issue are by German Erramouspe and thematically seem to be leftovers from the Crossed Badlands issues 40-43.
